success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service.

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results.

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results.

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters.

decision.description: The action Access will take if a user matches this policy. Infrastructure application policies can only use the Allow action.

exclude.description: Rules evaluated with a NOT logical operator. To match the policy, a user cannot meet any of the Exclude rules.

approval_groups.description: Administrators who can approve a temporary authentication request.

items.description: A group of email addresses that can approve a temporary authentication request.

approvals_needed.description: The number of approvals needed to obtain access.

email_addresses.description: A list of emails that can approve the access request.

email_list_uuid.description: The UUID of an re-usable email list.

approval_required.description: Requires the user to request access from an administrator at the start of each session.

isolation_required.description: Require this application to be served in an isolated browser for users matching this policy. 'Client Web Isolation' must be on for the account in order to use this feature.

purpose_justification_prompt.description: A custom message that will appear on the purpose justification screen.
purpose_justification_prompt.example: Please enter a justification for entering this protected domain.

purpose_justification_required.description: Require users to enter a justification when they log in to the application.

session_duration.description: The amount of time that tokens issued for the application will be valid. Must be in the format `300ms` or `2h45m`. Valid time units are: ns, us (or µs), ms, s, m, h.

app_count.description: Number of access applications currently using this policy.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

4XX.description: List Access reusable policies response failure.

GET /accounts/{account_id}/access/polici.description: Fetches a single Access reusable policy.

decision.description: The action Access will take if a user matches this policy. Infrastructure application policies can only use the Allow action.

exclude.description: Rules evaluated with a NOT logical operator. To match the policy, a user cannot meet any of the Exclude rules.

approval_groups.description: Administrators who can approve a temporary authentication request.

items.description: A group of email addresses that can approve a temporary authentication request.

approvals_needed.description: The number of approvals needed to obtain access.

email_addresses.description: A list of emails that can approve the access request.

email_list_uuid.description: The UUID of an re-usable email list.

approval_required.description: Requires the user to request access from an administrator at the start of each session.

isolation_required.description: Require this application to be served in an isolated browser for users matching this policy. 'Client Web Isolation' must be on for the account in order to use this feature.

purpose_justification_prompt.description: A custom message that will appear on the purpose justification screen.
purpose_justification_prompt.example: Please enter a justification for entering this protected domain.

purpose_justification_required.description: Require users to enter a justification when they log in to the application.

session_duration.description: The amount of time that tokens issued for the application will be valid. Must be in the format `300ms` or `2h45m`. Valid time units are: ns, us (or µs), ms, s, m, h.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

decision.description: The action Access will take if a user matches this policy. Infrastructure application policies can only use the Allow action.

exclude.description: Rules evaluated with a NOT logical operator. To match the policy, a user cannot meet any of the Exclude rules.

approval_groups.description: Administrators who can approve a temporary authentication request.

items.description: A group of email addresses that can approve a temporary authentication request.

approvals_needed.description: The number of approvals needed to obtain access.

email_addresses.description: A list of emails that can approve the access request.

email_list_uuid.description: The UUID of an re-usable email list.

approval_required.description: Requires the user to request access from an administrator at the start of each session.

isolation_required.description: Require this application to be served in an isolated browser for users matching this policy. 'Client Web Isolation' must be on for the account in order to use this feature.

purpose_justification_prompt.description: A custom message that will appear on the purpose justification screen.
purpose_justification_prompt.example: Please enter a justification for entering this protected domain.

purpose_justification_required.description: Require users to enter a justification when they log in to the application.

session_duration.description: The amount of time that tokens issued for the application will be valid. Must be in the format `300ms` or `2h45m`. Valid time units are: ns, us (or µs), ms, s, m, h.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

decision.description: The action Access will take if a user matches this policy. Infrastructure application policies can only use the Allow action.

exclude.description: Rules evaluated with a NOT logical operator. To match the policy, a user cannot meet any of the Exclude rules.

200.description: Update an Access reusable policy response.

4XX.description: Update an Access reusable policy response failure.
